long_description: Watch the sparks fly in the lightning-fast Blue Orange Flash! dice game. Players race to complete eight challenges and try to rack up the most points for electrifying fun. With three play variations, Flash! offers straightforward and quick fun. Game improves focus, fine motor skills, arithmetic and the ability to determine probability. Comes with 36 dice, six scoring chips, score pad and travel bag.
short_description: Watch the sparks fly in the lightning-fast Blue Orange Flash! dice game. Players race to complete eight challenges and try to rack up the most points for electrifying fun.
